pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Parametric Estimation of the Off-Pulse Interval of a Pulsar // Provides functions to non-parametrically estimate the off- pulse interval of a source function originating from a pulsar. The technique is based on a sequential application of P-values obtained from goodness-of-fit tests for the uniform distribution, such as the Kolmogorov-Smirnov, Cramer-von Mises, Anderson-Darling and Rayleigh goodness-of-fit tests.
